column3: nFees, mempoolRejectFee is already in the extended description (strDebugMessageIn) - A broader fix would be to log/return that where it's reported, instead of changing the main message.
Thanks, I'll do the changes and update the PR
Closing for now. Please reopen when you've adjusted this PR.

I don't think `Get*` is a good place to log a message.\n\nWhat I meant is that in the current place where you see "mempool min fee not met" being logged with further information, it should log the debug message of the state too, as the information is already in there just apparently not exposed.
Thanks for the review, I'll do the changes.
